query1: simple query IS comparison for department with two columns and old order syntax
complexquery: AND (GT avg 98) IS (dept adhe), OPTIONS (3 in columns) and old order syntax
d2courseQuerySimple: GT avg 98, OPTIONS (2 in column with 1 applied), TRANS (GROUP 1) APPLY overallavg on avg)
d3roomsquery1: AND (IS furniture *tables*) (GT seats 300) OPTIONS (2 in column) ORDER (dir down with 1 key)
coursewithNOT: NOT average LT 98, OPTIONS (2 in columns), GROUP 2, no order
